attributes.action: Enforce Magnitsky Act in the UK
attributes.additional_details: We have have to stop turning a blind eye to the blood money of butchers and despots which frankly flows all too freely through some British businesses, banks and property. It damages our economy , reputation and prices our people out of market.
attributes.background: UK House of Commons Passes the Magnitsky Asset Freezing Sanctions over a year ago . We are yet to see a single prosecution . It is already a decade later than it should have been acted on .

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for. Deciding whether to prosecute someone for a crime is the responsibility of the police and crown prosecution service.
